nodes.text: Escape from Darth Vader  (The Original Trilogy Stories)

"Escape from Darth Vader" is a short story written by Rebecca L. Schmidt that was published in the anthologies Star Wars: A New Hope: 6 stories in 1 and The Original Trilogy Stories. It adapts Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope from the opening to R2-D2 and C-3PO landing on Tatooine.
